author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gaming And Leisure Properties Says Operating Partnership Entered Amendment To Existing Credit Agreement
text:
May 22 (Reuters) - Gaming and Leisure Properties Inc :
* GAMING AND LEISURE PROPERTIES SAYS ON MAY 21, OPERATING PARTNERSHIP ENTERED AMENDMENT TO EXISTING CREDIT AGREEMENT - SEC FILING
* GAMING AND LEISURE PROPERTIES-AS PER AMENDMENT REVOLVER UNDER CREDIT AGREEMENT WAS REPLACED,UPSIZED TO ABOUT UP TO $1.1 BILLION OF R-1 REVOLVING COMMITMENTS Source text: ( bit.ly/2s5edQ7 ) Further company coverage:
